name: Guard 'N' Hose
description:
Spray water from your jetpack to defeat enemies and clear away deadly slime, but be warned - your water won't last forever! 

A water-spraying action game made for the Game Maker's Toolkit Jam. The theme of the jam was based on the video below. Before I knew it, I had created a game with a jetpack, just like Downwell. It just adds so much design opportunities for a frantic platformer that I couldn't help myself.

I've had trouble running the game in Chrome, but it seems to work fine in Firefox . I've also provided a link to a downloadable Windows Build if all else fails (Please fullscreen the game to allow for my hyper-wide aspect ratio).

Please enjoy,

Luke Archbell
